entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
